verses.verse: Then came <WH935> David <WH1732> to Nob <WH5011> to Ahimelech <WH288> the priest <WH3548>: and Ahimelech <WH288> came to meet <WH7125> David <WH1732> trembling <WH2729>, and said <WH559> unto him <WH376>, Why art thou alone, and no man with thee?
